Html:
Hello,
am trying to use quickgraph with .net web application. I am getting all sorts of error while trying to generate the graph. Please can someone show me an example for sample graph creation using quickgraph and use graphviz visualisation. I am getting 'dot' assembly not found error. Any help would be highly appreciated. Thanks in advance.
You need to get your hands on NGraphviz, which is not distributed with QuickGraph anymore. Or use GLEE, or use MSAGL.
